verses.roman:
nīlācale teṅho eka patrikā likhiyā
pratāparudrera pāśa dila pāṭhāiyā

synonyms: nīlācale—at Jagannātha Purī; teṅho—Kamalākānta; eka—one; patrikā—note; likhiyā—writing; pratāparudrera—Pratāparudra Mahārāja; pāśa—addressed to him; dila pāṭhāiyā—sent.
translation: When Kamalākānta Viśvāsa was in Jagannātha Purī, he sent a note through someone to Mahārāja Pratāparudra.
